==Abilities and Attacks==
* '''Frozen Shield:''' The Ice Shield Hilichurl Guard is equipped with a {{Color|Cryo|[[Frozen#Frozen Element|Frozen]]}} [[shield]], which blocks incoming DMG from the direction that it is facing. This shield is vulnerable to {{Pyro}}, {{Electro}} and [[Poise Damage]], and weakest to {{Pyro}}.

===Shield Intact===
*'''Smack:''' Swings its club at the player once, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.

===Shield Destroyed===
*'''Smack:''' Swings its club at the player once, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.
*'''Charged Smack:''' Charges and swings its club at the player powerfully, dealing '''200% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} and knocking the player back.
*'''Rapid Swings:''' Performs 3 consecutive swings at the player, dealing '''100% ATK''', '''100% ATK''', '''125% ATK''' with each swing as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.
